entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. POP 70%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 70 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this morning and this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h except 50 through mainland inlets and valleys early this morning. Wind becoming light this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 13 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
